description: This file defines a React functional component named 'App' that manages a theme toggle (light/dark mode) and renders a simple UI with a button, logo, and link. It includes state management with useState and side effects with useEffect.

methods.name: App
methods.description: React functional component that manages theme state and renders UI elements including a toggle button, logo, and link.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Function to toggle between 'light' and 'dark' themes.
